select project_name, building_name, house_no, u.name sales, c.start_date, c.expired_date, c.DEPOSIT_ELECTRIC_AMOUNT, c.DEPOSIT_AMOUNT from t_rent_contract c left join T_PROPERTY_PROJECT p on c.PROPERTY_PROJECT_ID = p.id left join T_BUILDING b on c.BUILDING_ID = b.id left join t_house h on c.house_id = h.id left join sys_user u on c.user_id = u.id
AND c.start_date >= str_to_date(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND c.expired_date <= str_to_date(#{expiredDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
